opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed; at appellant’s costs.
Mr. Chief Justice Bell took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

casebody.head_matter:
Spiegel v. Greenberg, Appellant.
Argued March 18, 1968.
Before Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
Allen N. Brunwasser, for appellant.
Robert G. Sable, with him Jerome M. Libenson, and Baskin, Boreman, Sachs, Gondelman & Craig, for appellee.
April 16, 1968:
